Header: SLFP Gen. Sec. hopes JO would attend party convention
Content: SLFP General Secretary, Minister Duminda Dissanayaka says they expect everyone who are connected to the party, including Joint Opposition MPs would attend the SLFPâ€™s 66 th anniversary celebrations to be held at the Campbell Park, tomorrow . The Minister said that the former President and others were invited for a second time. When asked that what steps would be taken against those who do not attend the party convention, Minister Duminda Dissanayaka stated that a decision will be taken later. However, former President Mahinda Rajapaksa said that their group decided not to attend the event.
